Package org.attribyte.snook.auth

Class HMACToken

java.lang.Object
org.attribyte.snook.auth.HMACToken
public class HMACToken extends Object
Generates HMAC keys and perform verification.

      Parameters:

      lifetime - The lifetime.
      lifetimeUnits - The lifetime units.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      Generates random HMAC keys. Usage: HMACToken -size=[number of hashes] [output file]

      Generates the key file, a signature key file [name].sig.key (if not present), a signature file [name].sig and a file containing just the ids [name].ids, one per line. Fails if any files exist other than the signature key file.

      Parameters:
      args - The arguments.
      Throws:
      Exception - on error.

    • validate

      public static HMACToken validate(String cookieValue, Function<String,com.google.common.hash.HashFunction> hmacFunctions)
      Validate a cookie value and create a token only if valid.
      Parameters:
      cookieValue - The cookie value.
      hmacFunctions - A function that returns a (keyed) HMAC function for a key id.
      Returns:
      The token or null if invalid.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
